docs.title: Welcome to GraphKB
docs.text: If you are interested in contributing this wiki. Please do not hesitate to reach me by liyunqixa@gmail.com.

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: GraphKB is a knowledge base about the graph. Most of the contents will focus on studying state-of-art graph techniques from the publications of "The most three top conference" (SIGMOD, VLDB and ICDE). Some foundamental knowledge, classical problems and their solutions will also be covered.

docs.title: Topics
docs.text:
• Basic graph knowledge
  • Classical graph problems and corresponding algorithms
  • Security in graph databases
  • Graph query processing algorithms
  • Graph summarization techniques
  • Useful tricks in implementing various techniques

docs.title: TODOS
docs.text: • Add graph meachine learning and netrual networks

docs.title: About Author
docs.text: Yunqi is a junior undergradurate in Hong Kong Univ of Sci & Tech. His major is CS+MATH. He is trying to do some research about graph in databases.

docs.title: Query Processing Techniques
docs.text: Currently three types of graph queries are covered in this wiki.

docs.title: Efficient Subgraph Matching by Postponing Cartesian Products
Introduction
docs.text:
Paper links.

This papre implement a new techniques which mainly focuses on auxiliary data structures (CPI) and matching order selection. But it's complicated than DAF and has been beaten by DAF in the survey: Deep Analysis on Subgraph Isomorphism.
